title: Introducing: Ladybug
content:
Primarily the creative outlet of Mara Neves and João Portela, Ladybug may well be one of the only artists from Portugal that CitR has covered in the almost five years of existence.

Calling in a few friends and acquaintances for their debut four track EP, it’s a colourful, elegant release; characterised by it’s sweeping, string sections. From the obvious lead track, Black Dog, to the more refined yet equally as poignant Good Fortune, it’s an EP of colossal potential, and one that would no doubt make for a stunning live performance. Check out a few of the tracks below, and grab the full EP from Bandcamp.
